<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Psychic Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3738) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 48</row>

**Archetype** [Psychic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=185)

**Prerequisites**
[Psychic Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3736)

</column>

---

You gain the [basic spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170). When you gain a spell slot of a new level from the psychic archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell level to your repertoire: a common occult spell, one of the granted spells from your conscious mind, or another spell you've learned or discovered.

<title level="2">Basic Psychic Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Expert Psychic Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3741)
